tool.name: metashrimps
tool.description: Metadata Shiny for Retroactive Information Management and Production of data paper Sketches
tool.command:
sed -i 's?input\$file\$datapath?"'$inputfile'"?g' /srv/shiny-server/sample-apps/META/App_metadig/app.R && mkdir -p /var/log/shiny-server && chown shiny.shiny /var/log/shiny-server &&
exec shiny-server >> /var/log/shiny-server.log 2>&1

param.name: inputfile
param.label: Input metadata file writen using EML Ecological standard

tool.help: `MetaShRIMPS <https://github.com/TanguyGen/metaCure>`_ is a R Shiny App to automate production of FAIR metrics and data paper sketche from Ecological Metadata Language based metadata documents
